name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with over 13 years of experience delivering high-performance applications in fintech and healthcare. Proficient in **TypeScript**, with extensive expertise in **React** and **React Native** for cross-platform development, demonstrating strong skills in secure authentication, including **WebAuthn** and clean architecture. Skilled in applying UX principles to create intuitive user interfaces and enhance user experiences. Adept in mobile development, utilizing SDKs and implementing collaborative strategies for effective communication within teams.

Additionally, I have hands-on experience in backend technologies such as **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, with a strong foundation in building AI/ML-powered platforms that leverage predictive analytics. I have deployed cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, successfully implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. I ensure compliance with industry standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS, while also having a robust background in MLOps, focusing on model training and orchestration using **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
